entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Manicouagan
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
